double bdsp::filter::HP1_RC_TPT::process ( double x)

Definition at line 19 of file HP1_RC_TPT.cpp.

20 {
21 // Calculate output for low-pass
22 double v = g1 * (x - s);
23 double y = v + s;
24
25 // Update state register
26 s = v + y;
27
28 // Subtract low-pass output from input to find high-pass output
29 return x - y;
30 }

References g1, and s.

void bdsp::filter::HP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff ( double cutoff)

Definition at line 32 of file HP1_RC_TPT.cpp.

33 {
34 // Calculate gamma from cutoff
35 const double w = bdsp::constants::TWO_PI * cutoff;
36 const double g = w / (2.0 * sample_rate);
37 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
38 }

Definition at line 40 of file HP1_RC_TPT.cpp.

41 {
42 // Calculate gamma from prewarped cutoff
43 const double w_prewarped = mappings::prewarp(cutoff, sample_rate);
44 const double g = w_prewarped / (2.0 * sample_rate);
45 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
46 }

float prewarp(const float freq, const float sample_rate)
Prewarp a frequency to be preserved in trapezoidal integration.
